sentences.en: I have rejected ideas, suppositions and theories that it is inherited, that it is instinctual.
sentences.cn: 我拒绝了观念 、 推测和那种说它是通过继承和本能获得的理论.

sentences.en: Instant Revelation in Zen Buddhism emphasizes an almost instinctual inherent intuition.
sentences.cn: 禅宗强调“明心见性,顿悟成佛”,这种直觉近乎本能却相当高级,看似神秘而更内在.

sentences.en: Like sex and hunger, laughter is instinctual, one of the few behaviors all have in common.
sentences.cn: 就像食与性, 笑是一种本能, 是我们少数几种共同的行为之一.

sentences.en: The relationship between a parent and a child is instinctual and stems from basic human nature.
sentences.cn: 父母与孩子的关系是天生的，源于基本的人性。

sentences.en: This business is trend - based and fashion - based. You have to be intuitive, instinctual, and gut - driven.
sentences.cn: 这个行业是建立在流行和时尚的基础之上的.你必须依靠直觉 、 本能以及勇气.

sentences.en: Tigers are regarded as among the most fearsome, instinctual hunters in the animal world.
sentences.cn: 在动物世界里,老虎被认为是最可怕的, 本能的猎手之一.

sentences.en: Your dog is symbolic of your instinctual nature and loyalty.
sentences.cn: 你的狗是你本能和忠实的象征.
